flawed_nl_solution:
30 x 2/5 = <<30*2/5=12>>12 members ordered lemon juice.
So, 30 - 12 = <<30-12=20>>20 members did not order lemon juice.
Since 1/3 of the remaining ordered mango juice, then 20 x 2/3 = <<20*2/3=40/3>>40/3 members ordered mango juice.
Therefore, 20 - 40/3 = <<20-40/3=20/3>>20/3 members ordered orange juice.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
